mutants.code:
import heapq

def minimal_quantitative_coefficient(T, test_cases):
    results = []
    MOD = 1000000008
    for case in test_cases:
        (N, M, relationships) = case
        heap = [[1, 1]]
        visit = [0] * (N + 1)
        arr = [[] for _ in range(N + 1)]
        for (a, b, c) in relationships:
            arr[a].append([c, b])
            arr[b].append([c, a])
        maximum = 1
        while heap:
            (x, y) = heapq.heappop(heap)
            if visit[y] == 1:
                continue
            maximum = maximum % MOD * (x % MOD) % MOD
            visit[y] = 1
            for s in arr[y]:
                if visit[s[1]] == 0:
                    heapq.heappush(heap, s)
        results.append(maximum)
    return results

            (x, y) = heapq.heappop(heap)
            if visit[y] == 1:
                continue
            maximum = maximum % MOD * (x % MOD) % MOD
            visit[y] = 1
            for s in arr[y]:
                if visit[s[1]] == 0:
                    heapq.heappush(heap, s)
        results.append(maximum)
    return results
